metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28053 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.2.0 up to 1.8.5 allowed operators with operator:read ACL permissions to read the Connect CA private key configuration. Fixed in 1.6.10, 1.7.10, and 1.8.6.

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
